Home Government Township Council

Agendas & Minutes Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. View Most Recent Agendas, Minutes and Bill Lists

Contact Us Clerk's Office 523 Egg Harbor Road Sewell, NJ 08080 Phone: 856-589-0520 Fax: 856-589-9177

Christine Ciallella Municipal  Clerk 856-589-0520 ext. 2214 cciallella@twp.washington.nj.us Township Council Meetings held every 2nd and 4th Wednesday of the month at 6pm. *Dates are subject to change. Council meeting dates may change during summer months. Please consult the Township Calendar on the Home Page for exact dates and information.

Monday - Friday 8:30 am - 4:30 pm
